issue_title: [Enhancement] 添加文件操作日志记录功能
summary: Add file operation logging to TodoStorage class
risks: None - logging is at DEBUG level and does not affect normal operation
limitations: Logs require FLYWHEEL_LOG=debug environment variable to be visible
acceptance_criteria_met: storage.py imports logging and creates module-level logger (_LOGGER)
load() method logs file path and loaded todo count at DEBUG level
save() method logs atomic write completion at DEBUG level
Tests verify logging.debug calls exist and work correctly
